description: This file is a server-side entry point for a Remix application, handling HTTP requests, differentiating between bot and browser clients, and streaming server-side rendered React components as responses.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main exported function handling incoming HTTP requests, setting CORS headers, routing to bot or browser handlers based on user-agent.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot user agents by streaming the rendered React app.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser user agents by streaming the React app.
